twitter.lasttweet.disabled.message: Not polling Tweets from home or user timeline.

twitter.post.failed.message: Failed to send message to Twitter.

twitter.register.success.message: Registered your Twitter ID as $1. To unregister, run !twitter unregister.

twitter.register.usage.message: usage: !twitter register [twitter_id]. Currently $1. Register/change your Twitter ID.

twitter.set.message.gamechange.success.message: Set Twitter auto-post game change message to $1

twitter.set.message.gamechange.usage.message: usage: !twitter set message gamechange [message]. Tags: (game) (twitchurl). Currently: $1

twitter.set.message.online.success.message: Set Twitter auto-post online message to $1

twitter.set.message.online.usage.message: usage: !twitter set message online [message]. Tags: (game) (twitchurl). Currently: $1

twitter.set.message.update.success.message: Set Twitter auto-post update message to $1

twitter.set.message.update.usage.message: usage: !twitter set message update [message]. Tags: (game) (twitchurl) (uptime). Currently: $1

twitter.set.poll.hometimeline.success.message: Set Twitter poll hometimeline to $1. Core will no longer poll anything else.

twitter.set.poll.hometimeline.usage.message: usage: !twitter set poll hometimeline [on/off]. Currently $1. Polls your entire timeline on Twitter, includes all Tweets on your timeline from others. Disables all other polling.

twitter.set.poll.mentions.usage.message: usage: !twitter set poll mentions [on/off]. Currently $1. Polls @mentions from Twitter.

twitter.set.poll.retweets.usage.message: usage: !twitter set poll retweets [on/off]. Currently $1. Polls your Retweets from Twitter.

twitter.set.poll.usage.message: usage: !twitter set poll [mentions | retweets | hometimeline | usertimeline]

twitter.set.poll.usertimeline.usage.message: usage: !twitter set poll usertimeline [on/off]. Currently $1. Polls your Tweets from Twitter.

twitter.set.polldelay.hometimeline.succe.message: Set Twitter polldelay hometimeline to $1 seconds.

twitter.set.polldelay.hometimeline.usage.message: usage: !twitter set polldelay hometimeline [seconds]. Minimum is 60. Currently $1.

twitter.set.polldelay.mentions.success.message: Set Twitter polldelay mentions to $1 seconds.

twitter.set.polldelay.mentions.usage.message: usage: !twitter set polldelay mentions [seconds]. Minimum is 60. Currently $1.

twitter.set.polldelay.minerror.message: Too small of a poll delay, minimum is $1 for this setting.

twitter.set.polldelay.retweets.success.message: Set Twitter polldelay retweets to $1 seconds.

twitter.set.polldelay.retweets.usage.message: usage: !twitter set polldelay rewteets [seconds]. Minimum is 60. Currently $1.

twitter.set.polldelay.usage.message: usage: !twitter set polldelay [mentions | retweets | hometimeline | usertimeline]

twitter.set.polldelay.usertimeline.succe.message: Set Twitter polldelay usertimeline to $1 seconds.

twitter.set.polldelay.usertimeline.usage.message: usage: !twitter set polldelay usertimeline [seconds]. Minimum is 15. Currently $1.

twitter.set.reward.announce.success.message: Set Twitter retweet reward announcements to $1.

twitter.set.reward.announce.usage.message: usage: !twitter set reward announce [on/off]. Currently $1. Toggle announcing rewards for retweets.

twitter.set.reward.cooldown.success.message: Set Twitter retweet reward cooldown to $1 hours.

twitter.set.reward.cooldown.usage.message: usage: !twitter set reward cooldown [hours]. Currently $1. Hours that user must wait between rewards.

twitter.set.reward.points.success.message: Set Twitter retweet reward amount to $1.

twitter.set.reward.points.usage.message: usage: !twitter set reward points [points]. Currently $1. Set reward amount for rewtweets.

twitter.set.reward.toggle.usage.message: usage: !twitter set reward toggle [on/off]. Currently $1. Toggle rewards for retweets.

twitter.set.reward.usage.message: usage: !twitter set reward [toggle | points | cooldown | announce]

twitter.set.updatetimer.toosmall.message: The minimum allowed value is 180 minutes to attempt to offset duplicate post rejection from Twitter.

twitter.set.updatetimer.usage.message: usage: !twitter set updatetimer [minutes]. Minimum allowed is 60 minutes to attempt to offset duplicate post rejection from Twitter.

twitter.set.usage.message: usage: !twitter set [message | polldelay | poll | post | updatetimer | reward]

twitter.usage.message: usage: !twitter [lasttweet | lastmention | lastretweet | set | post | id]
